original_title: Three-day special trains on Poson poya day
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka Railways (SLR) today announced special train services scheduled to Anuradhapura for three days to facilitate the pilgrims during the Poson Poya Day.
The special trains will be operated on June 2. The trains are scheduled to run mainly between Beliatta and Anuradhapura railway stations.
Accordingly, several trains are scheduled on June 2, 3 and 4 between Colombo Fort and Anuradhapura-Beliatta- Colombo Fort, and Galle-Anuradhapura.
